ie.gmit.sw.Reflection

Class CalculateMetrics

  • java.lang.Object
    • ie.gmit.sw.Reflection.CalculateMetrics
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Metricable

    public class CalculateMetrics
extends java.lang.Object
implements Metricable
    A class that is used to calculate the Afferent and Efferent couplings and Stability of a given class / jar file. For each class name in the List object returned from the ReadJarFileData class, add to the Key section of a Map and create a new Metric Object as the value (See the populateMap method in this class). As the Metrics are calculated, each Metric object in the map is updated with the Class Name, In Degree, Out Degree and Stability. To calculate the metrics for each class, Interfaces, Constructors, Fields and Methods are analysed and the data added to the HashMap. The calculateMetrics() class returns the 2d Object Array that's then used bu the View or GUI section of the Application.

      • displayMapValues

        public void displayMapValues(java.util.Map<java.lang.String,Metric> metricMap)
        Display Values stored in a Map. This displays the stored values for the Key(Class Names) and Metric Object(ClassName, InDegree, OutDegree, Stability)
        Specified by:
        displayMapValues in interface Metricable
        Parameters:
        metricMap - Takes a Map as an argument

      • populateMap

        public java.util.Map<java.lang.String,Metric> populateMap()
        A method that returns a Map. The map uses the returned values from the ListClass object, to populate the Key of the map and a new Metric Object is placed as the value for each class Name in the list.
        Specified by:
        populateMap in interface Metricable
        Returns:
        metricMap
